column4: Native American tribe holding patents sues Amazon and Microsoft
column5: A Native American tribe sued Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp in federal court in Virginia on Wednesday for infringing supercomputer patents it is holding for a technology firm.

column4: UPDATE 1-Native American tribe holding patents sues Amazon and Microsoft
column5: Oct 18 A Native American tribe sued Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp in federal court in Virginia on Wednesday for infringing supercomputer patents it is holding for a technology firm.

column4: Tesla to raise pay by 30 pct at German division - works council
column5: HAMBURG  Oct 18 Luxury electric car maker Tesla Inc and labour leaders at its German engineering unit have agreed a new pay structure that will raise workers' salaries by about 30 percent from current levels  the division's works council said.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm appoints Penny Baldwin as chief marketing officer
